* Iron Raptor didn't wait for a response from Tigerhawk as she then twisted 
her hand to the right, there was no time to be wasted.
A voice suddenly came from the computer...*
Iris: "It's been a while, what's up?"
* The voice was female but it had a tinge of computer buzz to it, it was 
obvious that this program was of artificial intelligence.
Iron Raptor shook her head.*

" There's been a slight report that the Predacons are planning to attack the 
Ark, is there any information that you can give me that'll help?"
Iris: " That depends, is there any information that YOU can give me on when 
my next upgrade is?"

*Iron Raptor snarled but ended it with a sigh.*

" I'll see what I can do. Now, any information?"
Iris:" Well, as you already know, the Predacon's have split up into two 
gropes, right? There are a few energy signatures at the Predacon base but 
two have just began to leave it. And there are a few more to the north, they 
were travailing at 80 mph but now have slowed down considerably. Anything 
else you would like to know?"

*Iron Raptor smiled, the system that she had been given by her creators was 
working like a charm! She then noticed Plintissa looking over her shoulder 
but turned back to the star.*

" No, that was all I needed to know. Thanx."
Iris: " Now, about that upgrade?"
*Iron Raptor sighed and shook her head.*
" We'll see what I can scrounge up, Iris. I can't make any promises, you 
know that."
Iris: *sigh*" Yeah! I know. Well, I guess that you'll be deactivating me 
now, huh?"
* Iron Raptor nodded*
" Afraid so. See you later then."
* Iron Raptor disconnected her hand from the impute, took the cord from the 
computer screen and placed back in her wrist, the shades then slid back into 
her brow and she turned to Plintissa.The star on the screen now gone.*

" I was checking on the details of what Tigerhawk had told me about the 
Predacons, now I know more about their locations. Any further questions?"

( I know that this post was a long one but I'll try and make them shorter in 
the future.)
